definitions.definition: Someone who likes to talk about other people's private or personal business.
definitions.example: Be careful what you say to him: he’s a bit of a gossip.

definitions.definition: Idle talk about someone’s private or personal matters, especially someone not present.
definitions.example: According to the latest gossip, their relationship is on the rocks.

definitions.definition: A genre in contemporary media, usually focused on the personal affairs of celebrities.
A sponsor; a godfather or godmother; the godparent of one's child.
Title used with the name of one's child's godparent or of a friend.
To talk about someone else's private or personal business, especially in a manner that spreads the information.
To stand godfather to; to provide godparents for.
To enjoy oneself during festivities, to make merry.
